main event: An unidentified flying object (UFO) was reported in Crescent City, California on October 17, 1944, observed by four witnesses.
interesting points: The object made a 45Â° banking turn and reflected sunlight strongly,The witnesses had no technical training but provided consistent reports,The sighting lasted several minutes, ruling out meteor identification,The object could have been a balloon or aircraft, but its maneuver did not fully support this theory,No photographs were included in the reports.
witness description: Observers included locals with varying backgrounds and occupations.
